original_title: 「えっ！？コレが実習？」エステ専門学校に入学したら男はボク1人！実習はタオル1枚の女子の体を触りまくり！ボクの股間は触られまくりでフル勃起！

title: “What!? Is This Really Training?” I Started Working At A Massage Parlor And Found I Was The Only Man! Training Involved Touching A Girl Wrapped In A Towel All Over Her Body! When My Own Crotch Got Touched My Cock Got Fully Hard Instantly!
